panels.description: 1 minus ratio of blocks written to specified endurance
panels.title: SSD endurance

targets.expr: sum by(instance, mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node", instance="$node",mode=~"system|user"}[$rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node", instance="$node"}[$rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node", instance="$node",mode=~"iowait"}[$rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node", instance="$node"}[$rate_interval])))

panels.description: Percentage of time during the last 24h when connection to a given PDS was live
panels.title: Connection uptime over 24h
